verses.name: Acts 11:23
verses.text: Who, when he came, and had seen the grace of God, was glad, and exhorted them all, that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord.

verses.name: Acts 11:24
verses.text: For he was a good man, and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith: and much people was added unto the Lord.

verses.name: Acts 11:25
verses.text: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus, for to seek Saul:

verses.name: Acts 11:26
verses.text: And when he had found him, he brought him unto Antioch. And it came to pass, that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church, and taught much people. And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch.
